title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, an error message is shown: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5. This occurs when there are unsaved changes in the open files.
OB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' is shown.
EB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the JAR creation process should not fail due to unsaved changes in open files.
SR:
1. Open some files in the JAR packager.
2. Make changes to the files.
3. Press the finish button in the JAR packager.
4. Verify that the JAR creation process completes successfully and does not show the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
